import React,{useRef} from 'react' import './search-bar.css' import{ Col, Form,FormGroup } from "reactstrap"; const SearchBar = () => { const lokasiRef = useRef('') const jarakRef = useRef('0') const groupRef = useRef('0') const searchHandler = ()=>{ const lokasi = lokasiRef.current.value const jarak = jarakRef.current.value const group = groupRef.current.value if (lokasi =='' || jarak =='' || group ==''){ return alert('Harus diisi terlebih dahulu!'); } } return

} export default SearchBar
